text: Sending solidarity to the teacher unions, teachers and school staff whose aim&genuine wish is to get children back to school but only when it is safe to do so. Today’s reports in some “Newspapers” naming union activists with pictures calling them “Zealots” is shameful. #Covid19

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden
